name: Renter 2021
description:
INTRO:

Renter 2021 is a series of minigames you have to complete while you wait for wait for your landlord to return from his vacation. There is also an endless mode that I added in the last hour of the jam. If you enjoyed the game, please post  your high score in the comments! There was supposed to be a bathroom, and two extra minigames as well. However, I was unable to complete these because of time restrictions. I'll make an update to add that cut content, if the game is received well.

NOTE: Hard mode is how I intended this game to be played, the timers and minigames are supposed to make you feel panicked or "on the edge" some might say ;). However, I added an easy mode so all can enjoy it.

DIRECTIONS:

Most directions will be in the game.

Press TAB to open up the room switch menu.

CREDITS:

All parts of the game were created by me with the exception of the song.

Song was made by Juhani Junkala:

This asset was obtained on opengameart.
